title: New Office for a Growing Team at Integration Matters -- HAT
text:
HATTINGEN, Germany , September 2,   Integration services experts Integration Matters is marking its 10-year anniversary in business with a move to new headquarters in Hattingen, in the Ruhr region of Germany .
     (Photo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150902/263124 )

Located in a 20,000 square meter business park, the recently modernized office building which is to be known as IM-Park has been chosen to accommodate the company's growing team.
The move marks an exciting new chapter for the business, which was previously based around 20 miles way in Essen , also in the Ruhr area. With a 270-strong global customer base, the new location's proximity to both the airport Düsseldorf and nearby research facilities in the city of Bochum is a key strength.
Managing director and co-founder of Integration Matters Hendrik Siegeln commented: "The space has been designed to enhance communication within and across all functions and it also offers room for growth. Most importantly, initial reactions from our employees have been very enthusiastic."
At the heart of Integration Matters' success is a stellar end-to-end process monitoring solution, nJAMS, capable of unearthing a new level of business process insights and real-time visibility across high-volume, automated processes. Efficiency and reliability are enhanced while costs are reduced. Furthermore, the discrepancies and silos that can manifest when working across different time zones and cultures are addressed, all of which translates into significant competitive advantage.
Along with co-founder Abdelghani Faiz , Siegeln has steered the business which has grown steadily by word of mouth since 2005, underpinned by the simple mantra that integration is the core driver of the IT world. Integration Matters is where some of the biggest hitters and household names turn when they want to optimize their business performance.
Siegeln added: "The new office is a statement that we're here to stay. It demonstrates our intention to become even more successful in the years to come."
About Integration Matters  
Integration Matters is the brand behind the companies Faiz & Siegeln GmbH for consulting, and Faiz & Siegeln Software GmbH for its' not Just Another Monitoring Solution products.
Integration Matters helps companies to deliver on brand promises by providing tools and expertise necessary to design, implement and monitor end-to-end business processes in high-volume and high-availability environments. By partnering with several renowned integration providers (e.g. TIBCO, Oracle, SAP) Integration Matters is able to offer its clients the optimal solutions for their specific requirements.
Testifying to the success of its products and services, 270 clients from the energy, telecom, banking, insurance, retail and transport and logistics industries, spread across the globe, as well as 3.000 installed servers. Integration Matters is the brand behind the companies Faiz & Siegeln GmbH for consulting, and Faiz & Siegeln Software GmbH for software products. nJAMS is not Just Another Monitoring Solution. It is a sophisticated tool for the transparent, real-time monitoring of business-critical, end-to-end processes.
